snippet: The decision came after Hamas leaders informed the race’s organizer, a United Nations agency, that women would not be allowed to take part under any circumstances.
abstract: Third annual marathon run in Gaza, set for April 10, is cancelled after Islamic leaders bar women from participating.
lead_paragraph: The decision came after Hamas leaders informed the race’s organizer, a United Nations agency, that women would not be allowed to take part under any circumstances.

headline.seo: Gaza Marathon Canceled After Women Are Barred From Participating
headline.main: Gaza Marathon Canceled After Women Are Barred From Participating
headline.print_headline: Gaza: Marathon Canceled Over a Ban on Women
